titleStmt.title: The second and third treatises of the first part of ancient church-government the second treatise containing a discourse of the succession of clergy.
titleStmt.author: R. H., 1609-1678.

titleStmt.title: The second and third treatises of the first part of ancient church-government the second treatise containing a discourse of the succession of clergy.
titleStmt.author: R. H., 1609-1678.
R. H., 1609-1678. Third treatise of the first part of ancient church-government.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to R.H. [i.e. Abraham Woodhead] by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
"The second treatise" has caption title: Succession of clergy.
"The third treatise" ([13], 188 p.) has separate paging and special t.p.: The third treatise of the first part of ancient church-government ... Oxford printed : [s.n.], MDCLXXXVIII [1688].
Marginal notes in The third treatise.
"Corrigenda": prelim. p. [4] and p. [12] of 3rd count.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
Item at 2068:23 is Third treatise only.
